channel.description: Okay, totally noob question, but I forgot how to do it. Can someone please post here how to set the maximum number of connections (or players) that can be logged in.

item.title: Setting Max Players
item.dc:creator: @Original_Bacon Original Bacon
item.description:
@Original_Bacon wrote:

ok open ur player handler.java it should be right at the top it should look something like this:

// Remark: the player structures are just a temporary solution for now
// Later we will avoid looping through all the players for each player
// by making use of a hash table maybe based on map regions (8x8 granularity should be ok)
public static final int maxPlayers = 200;
public static Player players[] = new Player[maxPlayers];
public int playerSlotSearchStart = 1;

Edit this line : public static final int maxPlayers = 200;

Max players= (how many u want).

and then compile and start ur server.

Typical problem is where peoples server crashes when it reaches max players and someone tries to get in. Happens to me and i dont know how to fic it soz.
